price: 36. Mpe ebele kati na bango bazali kolanda sé makanisi, kasi makanisi ekosala bosembo eloko moko te, ya soló Allah ayebi malamu maye bazali kosala.
arabic: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā yattabiʿu aktharuhum illā ẓannan inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā yafʿalūna
